Method Detail

translateToDate

public static java.util.Date translateToDate(java.lang.String aDate)
Takes a string representing a date and converts it to a real date. The format of the string is "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss". This method makes use of the translateToDate(date,format) method

Parameters:
aDate - the date string to be converted
Returns:
Date the converted date

translateToDate

public static java.util.Date translateToDate(java.lang.String aDate,
                                             java.lang.String aFormat)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
Takes a string representing a date and converts it to a real date according to a given format.

Parameters:
aDate - the date string to be converted
aFormat - the pattern that the date is formatted in.
Returns:
Date the converted date
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if the format is not supported or the date is incorrectly formatted
